channel.title: Help server ddosed or flooded?
channel.description: I leave my server running so players could play while im out obviously, and last night while i was out some douchebag came onto my server ( Zenith source ) and used the account Zalo which I had forgotten to remove. Being admin he banned some of my Players and somehow he crashed my server? I have no idea how but he managed, so I thought if I just opened it again it would work, but of course it has to be more complicated, NOW all my players can not connect to my server! The client stays stuck at 1% ( Like it did before I established a connection to my server ) So somehow this guy managed to disconnect my client to my server I guess? Can anyone at all give me some advice or help me.. GREATLY appreciated, thank you

item.title: Help server ddosed or flooded?
item.dc:creator: @Vanacy Vanacy
item.description:
@Vanacy wrote:

Thats the weird thing the run cmd looks fine to me! No nulls or anything anywhere

Read full topic

i personally dont know… im not that good with DDOSers and hackers.

If you don’t know then don’t post.

Vanacy:

So theres no way for me to stop this? Other than spending a small fortune on DDOS protection?

Check for nulls etc in the output.
And pretty much

item.title: Help server ddosed or flooded?
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

Matrix has hidden stuff inside allowing people to rape your server.
It’s also full of shit code.
If you’re getting ddosed be ready to spend loads of money to buy ddos protection.

Use a different version or source pls
